themes: prioritization of established organizations with proven impact
perceived favoritism or bias in grant awards
appropriate scaling of grants for new or small organizations
key_phrases: increased prioritization of arts orgs that have a proven and deep impact
lower-tier grant such a Nexus would be sufficient for these smaller, unproven orgs
Thrive did state that applicants must have been in business for at least five years
certain awardees were granted large awards based on personal relations with EDD staff
barriers_identified: lack of adherence to eligibility requirements
large grants awarded to unproven or newly formed organizations
solutions_proposed: increase prioritization of organizations with proven and deep community impact
use lower-tier grants like Nexus for smaller, unproven organizations
enforce eligibility requirements such as minimum years in business
